Dock FAQ

How are compliments counted?

Each transaction is verified at the intake arch: specific praise, addressed by name, and tied to service quality.

Can I preload compliments?

Yes. Harbor kiosks can credit your account up to 80 compliments before boarding.

Do children need compliment balances?

Riders under 10 glide free when accompanied by a guardian with at least 8 compliments in reserve.
